name: Cathode Rush
description:
Created in under 2 weeks for My First Game Jam: Summer 2021

Gain air jumps by shooting targets and make your way through the city as a cute CRT robot.

Controls
Movement: WASD
Jump: W or Space
Shoot: Left Click
Slide: Left Shift

Credits
Kyota Poeti: Programming and Level Design
Daniel Christian: Sound Effects
Richard Williams: Music
Javier Ceballos (zabyx): Art and Animation
